name: navigations_get_node_content
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool unofficial_shein.
Tool description: This API helps to query for almost everything that you see PUBLICLY on SHEIN's sites
API description: Fetches the content of a node in a navigation hierarchy.

is_id.description: The 'id' field value returned from the /navigations/get-root endpoint.

cat_id.description: The 'cat_id' field value returned from the /navigations/get-tabs endpoint.
